name: Cowboy Clay Showcase Demo
description:
An early demo of our Fantasy Samurai Western 2D Action Fighting Game concept, for your consideration. This download includes a version for both Mac and Windows operating systems.

((At the moment, Cowboy Clay is best played using an Xbox Controller, though Keyboard Controls are also available via the README document))

Credits:

Designer/Artist - Jordan Resin

Programmer - Michael Poltronieri Tang

Music/Sound Design - Chad "Dtrytts" Schoenberg
